SELECT t.id, t.dict_code AS dictCode, t.dict_value AS dictValue, t.dict_type_code AS dictTypeCode, t.dict_desc AS dictDesc, t.dict_order AS dictOrder FROM t_sys_dict t WHERE 1=1
AND t.dict_value LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dictValue},'%')
ORDER BY t.dict_type_code,t.dict_order
SELECT t.id, t.dict_code AS dictCode, t.dict_value AS dictValue FROM t_sys_dict t WHERE t.dict_type_code=#{dictTypeCode} ORDER BY t.dict_order
